member.name: T:TeleScope.Connectors.Mqtt.Abstractions.IMqttConnectable
member.summary: This interface provides extended methods, based on the interfaces `IConnectable` and `IAsyncConnectable` in order to build mqtt connections to external brokers.

member.name: M:TeleScope.Connectors.Mqtt.Abstractions.IMqttConnectable.Subscribe(System.String)
member.summary: Subscribes to a topic at a given mqtt connection.
member.param: The topic that the mqtt connector will listen to.

member.name: M:TeleScope.Connectors.Mqtt.Abstractions.IMqttConnectable.Unsubscribe(System.String)
member.summary: Unsubscribes from a topic at a given mqtt connection.
member.param: The topic that the mqtt connector will not listen to anymore.
